channel.title: Reset Stats [pi] & a gambling npc question
channel.description:
I've been attempting to add an interface where players can choose which stat they'd like to reset. I found a good guide here,
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444028.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444028.0.html[/url]
But when I compiled the last part in the clickmost.class I got a 100 error. I know this means there's a missing or too many brackets. Could anyone help point out for me where this occurs?
Thanks.
So I have also followed another guide for a gambling npc @
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536456.0.html
Here I got everything correct except for an error I've never heard of which was ,
http://prntscr.com/3cr3dg
Any and all help is appreciated.

@matzie wrote:

your second error is this:
switch (*) {
}
case 200: <- orphaned case
